medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The abdominal pain started 3 days ago while the patient was visiting, initially severe and diffuse, associated with some nausea. The pain worsened and localized to the right lower quadrant (RLQ). The patient did not seek medical attention immediately and flew back directly to the emergency department. He has been passing flatus and having bowel movements.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Recurrent diverticulitis, CAD status post stent, cervical spondylosis and radiculopathy, diabetes mellitus, reactive airways disease, severe GERD, postherpetic neuralgia, hyperlipidemia, renal insufficiency (baseline 1.2-1.3).
